message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a better agreement.
I understand your position, Bob, but $105 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. How about we settle at $110? It's a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get closer to my target price.
